'''Clea''' is a character in the [[Season 5|fifth season]].<ref>[http://watchersonthewall.com/two-casting-calls-hint-tyrions-season-five-storyline/]</ref> She will be played by [[Gwyneth Keyworth]].<ref>[http://winteriscoming.net/2014/10/17/two-new-characters-cast-game-thrones-lost-misfits/]</ref> Clea is a Volantene courtesan.
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, there is no character by the name of Clea. Tyrion does encounter a prostitute in [[Volantis]], though her name is not mentioned.
